charts.title: Average Weekly Sales Trend
charts.reason: 1. Question answered: What is the trend in average weekly sales over time? 2. Decision it supports: Helps understand sales performance over time, identify patterns, and plan stocking strategies.

charts.title: Impact of Holidays on Weekly Sales
charts.reason: 1. Question answered: How do holidays affect weekly sales? 2. Decision it supports: Assists in planning promotions and inventories for holiday periods.

charts.title: Temperature Effects on Weekly Sales
charts.reason: 1. Question answered: Is there a correlation between temperature changes and sales performance? 2. Decision it supports: Guides weather-related stock and pricing strategies.

charts.title: Fuel Price Correlation with Weekly Sales
charts.reason: 1. Question answered: What is the relationship between fuel prices and sales trends? 2. Decision it supports: Informs pricing strategies considering changes in operational costs.

charts.title: CPI Trends Over Time
charts.reason: 1. Question answered: How does the Consumer Price Index (CPI) change over time? 2. Decision it supports: Understanding economic trends helps in pricing strategy and predicting consumer purchasing power.

charts.title: Unemployment Trends Over Time
charts.reason: 1. Question answered: What are the trends in unemployment rates over time? 2. Decision it supports: Provides insights into economic health, influencing demand forecasting.
